channel.title: Cassandra error: Object of type data is not JSON serializable
channel.description: Hi, We have an error when trying to execute queries in Cassandra databases, the error: "Object of type data is not JSON serializable" is being displayed. Could you help us?

item.title: Cassandra error: Object of type data is not JSON serializable
item.dc:creator: lscapim
item.description:
Hi,
We have an error when trying to execute queries in Cassandra databases, the error: “Object of type data is not JSON serializable” is being displayed.
Could you help us?

Read full topic
